>What is Local Textboard
It's an offline 4chan simulator without images. That's it.

>But why?
Maybe you want to store text, links and all sorts of information in 4chan post style. Or maybe you want to practice your samefagging skills. Whatever it is you want to do, feel free to do so.

That's it for the introduction.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.content:
>how to use
It's all intuitive.

>make a thread
>or create board
>Board Settings change the name, subtitle and banner image
>as well as an option to delete the board

Banner images are in the static/images folder. just put the file name (with its extension). Note that all images should only be 300x100px in size.

Click [show boards] to show the list of boards.

That's it. Nothing too complicated.
